CustomField.description: NICC-024063 ***THIS FIELD IS DISPLAYED IN THE PARTNER COMMUNITY*** Originally created to display org information of the opportunity record related to the Subscription Activation record to Partner Community users. This allows the Partner Community users to see this information without giving them access to the Opportunity object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The org information of the opportunity related to this subscription activation record
CustomField.label: Org Information
